Trigger You become @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Grabbed] by a creature

Effect You twist and thrash your body around, dealing 1d4 plus your Strength modifier piercing damage (@Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/4) + @actor.abilities.str.mod)d4[piercing]]) to the triggering creature. This damage increases by 1d4 at 5th level and every four levels thereafter.
